data.text:
In Jeff Bridges

His subsequent films include Seabiscuit (2003), Stick It (2006), and Iron Man (2008), which was based on the Marvel Comics comic strip. In 2009 Bridges starred with George Clooney in The Men Who Stare at Goats, a comedy that centres on a secret U.S. Army unit trained to use…

In Chris Cooper

In Gary Stevens

…Woolf in the 2003 film Seabiscuit. In 2011 Stevens signed on to portray Ronnie Jenkins, a former jockey on the skids on the HBO cable-television series Luck.
